DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy topical antifungal formulation , Luliconazole Solution , 10 % , treatment adult onychomycosis toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Luliconazole Solution , 10 % Subjects With Mild Moderate Onychomycosis
DOC.criteria: Subjects either gender , race age 18 70 inclusive Subjects clinical diagnosis culture confirmation distal subungual onychomycosis ( DSO ) Subjects must free disease Investigator 's opinion might interfere study evaluation jeopardize subject 's safety Subjects history intolerance hypersensitivity imidazole compound inactive component solution Subjects currently participate recently participate another investigational medication device study
